rules_text:
Whenever Rex becomes untapped, surveil 1.
[i]Fusion Art[/i] - {X}{U}, {T}, Put a stun counter on Rex, Apt Salvager: Choose target artifact card with mana value X or less in your graveyard. If {R}{W} was spent, you may choose target Blade card with mana value X or less in your graveyard instead. Put the chosen card on the battlefield.
notes: 2.2.1: Moved the surveil to an untap trigger and had rex put a stun counter on himself to salvage to slow down looping better and provide topple synergy.
